name: Transylvania
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: I am thirsty, thorsty of your blood
attacked: So you want to do it that way ? Fine, I'll make a beautiful tomb for you.
introduction: Would you like to share a dinner with us ?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: All newly-trained [Melee] units [in all cities] receive the [Vampire] promotion
